channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- File & Removable Media Protection (FRP)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- File & Removable Media Protection (FRP)

item.title: CVE-2020-7316|2024-08-04T09:25:49.056Z -- mcafee -- file%20%26%20removable%20media%20protection%20%28frp%29
item.description: Unquoted service path vulnerability in McAfee File and Removable Media Protection (FRP) prior to 5.3.0 allows local users to execute arbitrary code, with higher privileges, via execution and from a compromised folder. This issue may result in files not being encrypted when a policy is triggered.
